channel.title: How do I get a Client?
channel.description: anyone know how i may get a client so i would stop logging out of the server and i can turn on lunar migicks and my computer won't freeze. :confused:

item.title: How do I get a Client?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

A lot of clients support it, it’s just the one you’re currently using might be old.

There are plenty that support it though.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get a Client?

item.title: How do I get a Client?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

look for a client that can support lunar, just go threw a server download section, look for a server that has lunar in it, and it should have a client download, just download it and log on.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get a Client?
